article:
'Progesterex' is a fictitious date rape drug that would purportedly cause
sterilization. It is part of a hoax that began to circulate in 1999 via e-mail
on the internet. No actual drug by this name or even with these properties
exists, and no such incident has ever been documented or confirmed. [http://www.tribune.ie/archive/article/2007/apr/29/beaumont-
hospital-investigates-fake-email-warning-/ Beaumont Hospital investigates fake
email warning of rape drug ] The most high
profile person falling for the hoax was British MP Lynne Featherstone who asked
a question about the fake drug in Parliament.
